Module fastwritinggame
Package com.fastwriting.model

Class GameStatistics

java.lang.Object
com.fastwriting.model.GameStatistics
public class GameStatistics extends Object
Model class for tracking game statistics and performance metrics. Stores data about player performance, timing, and accuracy during gameplay.
Since:
2024
Version:
1.0
Author:
[Your Name]
